Package fr.zinraphil.models.geometry

Class Line

java.lang.Object
fr.zinraphil.models.geometry.Shape<Line>
fr.zinraphil.models.geometry.Line
All Implemented Interfaces:
IDrawable, IAxialSymmetry, ICentralSymmetry, IHomothethy, IRotation, ITranslation, Comparable<Shape>
public class Line extends Shape<Line> implements IDrawable, IRotation, ITranslation, ICentralSymmetry, IHomothethy, IAxialSymmetry
Represents a line in a two-dimensional plane. It extends the Shape class and implements the IDrawable, IRotation, ITranslation, IHomothethy, IAxialSymmetry and ICentralSymmetry interfaces.

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(Shape o)
      Compares this line to another shape. If the other shape is not a line, the comparison is based on the class names. If the other shape is a line, the comparison is based on the start points, then the end points.
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface Comparable<Shape>
      Parameters:
      o - the other shape to compare to
      Returns:
      a negative integer, zero, or a positive integer as this line is less than, equal to, or greater than the other shape
